product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Original Stand Up Paddleboard - 10' 6"
long_description: Perfect for cruising on flatwater and charging light surf, this Original BIC Sport paddleboard combines durability and performance to create a great multipurpose board for all paddlers.
